settings.heading: Where does Analog Coffee Co. source its beans?
settings.row_content: We source our beans directly from small-batch farmers in premier coffee-growing regions around the world. We prioritize fair trade practices and sustainable farming methods.

settings.heading: What makes Analog Coffee Co. different from other coffee shops?
settings.row_content: Our commitment to the entire coffee journey - from cherry to cup. We roast our own beans in small batches, ensuring peak freshness and flavor in every brew.

settings.heading: Do you offer coffee subscriptions?
settings.row_content: Yes! We offer flexible subscription plans for our freshly roasted beans, delivered right to your door. You can choose your preferred roast, grind, and delivery frequency. Checkout the Coffee Club page for more details!

settings.heading: What brewing methods do you use in your shop?
settings.row_content: We specialize in both traditional and modern brewing methods, including pour-over, French press, espresso, cold brew, and our signature Analog Drip.

settings.heading: Are your coffee beans organic?
settings.row_content: Many of our beans are certified organic. All our coffees are sourced from farmers who prioritize sustainable and environmentally friendly practices, whether certified or not.

settings.heading: Do you offer non-dairy milk alternatives?
settings.row_content: Absolutely! We offer a variety of non-dairy options including oat, almond, soy, and coconut milk at no extra charge.

settings.heading: Can I buy your coffee beans to brew at home?
settings.row_content: Yes! We sell our freshly roasted beans in-store and online. We can grind them to your specifications or provide whole beans for home grinding.

settings.heading: Do you offer coffee education or tasting events?
settings.row_content: We regularly host cupping sessions, brewing workshops, and farm-to-cup educational events. Check our events calendar or sign up for our newsletter to stay informed.
